alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Clay; Duval; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 1:42PM EDT until August 15 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bradford County in northern Florida... Southeastern Baker County in northeastern Florida... Northeastern Union County in northern Florida... Northwestern Clay County in northeastern Florida... Western Duval County in northeastern Florida... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 142 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Raiford, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raiford, Maxville, New River, Lawtey, Johnstown, and Ellerbee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
